# Data sources

The dataset for our project is `speed dating` dataset provided by Anna Montoya. It is publicly available on [Data.com](https://data.world/annavmontoya/speed-dating-experiment) as an excel file. 

The data contains information about match and questionnaire from a speed dating experiment in 2002-2004 that was run by professors Ray Fisman and Sheena Iyengar from Columbia Business School. The primamry purpose of the collection was for their paper Gender Differences in Mate Selection: Evidence From a Speed Dating Experiment.
